description:
Very cool and incomplete
-> Lacks keyboard shortcuts
-> Lack freedom on cursor movement (you can just go right or left, going to the next line on the final of the current line)
-> Lacks freedom on altering position of the boxes (it altomatically choose where the box with be) 
-> Some bugs
summary: Ok. This project has great power and potential, but it's incomplete

description: I went full screen and couldn't get out when I toggled F11. Nothing worked. Had to restart the computer. Otherwise, I kind of liked it.
If it doesn't open nor doesn't work it is not worth the one star?
